title: 2025 Greek presidential election - Wikipedia
snippet: A third round of voting was held on 6 February 2025, where no candidate reached the reduced required majority of 180. The fourth round was held on 12 February 2025, where Konstantinos Tasoulas was elected as President of Greece.

title: Greece Elects New President Despite MPs' Walkout Over Train Crash | Balkan Insight
snippet: His inauguration will take place on March 13, when the term of the current President, Katerina Sakellaropoulou, ends.

title: Presidential Election 2025 Greece
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas is elected President of Greece

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas Becomes the New President of Greece - GreekReporter.com
snippet: Greeceâ€™s Parliament elected Konstantinos Tasoulas as the next President of the Republic on Wednesday. In the fourth round of voting, Tasoulas gained 160 votes in the 300-member chamber.

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas - Wikipedia
snippet: Following the 2019 election, Tasoulas was elected President of the Hellenic Parliament with a record of 283 votes in favor, from the government ND party, as well as the opposition parties of Syriza, KINAL, EL, and MeRA25, with the Communist Party of Greece submitting a notion of 15 "present" voters, and two abstentions (by Dimitris Tzanakopoulos and Effie Achtsioglou). It was also the first time a Speaker of the Parliament was elected by open ballot. In January 2025, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis submitted to the Parliament for approval the candidacy of Tasoulas for the office of the Greek Presidency.
